FuncDef: This command specifies the out-of-profile DSCP name for the forwarding class. The corresponding DSCP value will be used for all IP packets requiring marking the egress on this forwarding class queue that are out-of-profile. The exceed-profile traffic is marked with the same value as out-of-profile traffic.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the system- or user-defined, case-sensitive dscp-name. Values-Any defined system- or user-defined dscp-name.

ExtraInfo:
Default: Policy-id 1:Factory setting
Policy-id 2 to 65535:Policy-id setting
